message.body: Hi! I don't know what reservation you made for mikado tomorrow but Anna wants to come :)
Of course! i was counting her, haha.
Hey, if you're in lloyd, could you please do me a favor and check if my key is in my door, and, if not, check if my door is open? thank you!
Sorry I just got up. The answer is no and no :(
I found it! thanks so much though! see you later:)

Hey I don't know if you know this but Emily Matt and Lizzie are presenting their theses from 4-6. If you won't be back for it ill see you after! Also we are not wearing senior party things to dinner, right?
Aw man, i didn't know that! i don't think i will be back in time. i am not planning to get dressed beforehand.
The reservation's under fairleigh, btw. let me know if there are problems!
Hey, i am thinking of going to dinner at 5:30\6, if you are interested. i think sam's going earlier if you'd rather do that though.
